name: Шампунь Schauma Men Против перхоти Intensive 360мл
ingredients: aqua (water, eau), sodium laureth sulfate, cocamidopropyl betaine, sodium chloride, zinc pyrithione, zingiber officinale (ginger) root extract, citric acid, peg7 glyceryl cocoate, parfum (fragrance), polyquaternium-10, propylene glycol, sodium polynaphthalenesulfonate, sodium benzoate, limonene, linalool, phenoxyethanol
